inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.

inclusion.criterion: Ability to give consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.

exclusion.criterion: Age under 18 years or over 60 years
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to contrast media or iodine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or contraindication to antibiotic therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe systemic illness (for example malignancy, medical condition requiring immunosuppressant medication)
exclusion.label: unknown
